lead_paragraph: When ambitious junior executive Tom Stansfield (Kutcher) accepts an invitation to the stately home of his grouchy boss (Terence Stamp -- THE HAUNTED MANSION), he thinks it is for a big date with his boss's sexy daughter (Reid). But Tom gets a big su
